snippet.title: Deathtrap - Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Deathtrap is now released for PC!
To be released on Xbox One and PS4 later.

Deathtrap is a tower-defense / action-RPG hybrid with many exciting features you've been longing to see in the tower-defense genre. Choose from three game modes (PvP, Single Player and Cooperative Campaign), create your own maps and monsters, share them with your friends and get ready for a game of vicious tricks, killing machines, rotating blades and splattering blood.

Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/310510/
Home: http://neocoregames.com/deathtrap/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/DeathtrapTheGame
Twitter: https://twitter.com/DeathtrapGame
